ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Activated'), Count_RMA_Line_Type__c > 0, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(SBCF_Order_Type__c), 'Return')), Quote_Business_Group__c != 'Barracuda MSP' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Order Type and Order Line Type do not match. Please correct the Order Type.
